name: Winter Survival (ox)
description:
It's winter and you're lost in the woods with NOTHING! Gather supplies, craft tools, keep yourself fed and warm to somehow survive until the rescue part arrives!

Controls:
movement: WASD and arrows
sprint: shift
cycle tools: E
eat food: F
toggle build menu: B
toggle options menu: O

P.S. Thank you for playing my silly game. Sadly had to cut features because compo limits are hard, but the core gameplay should be there. Tip: berries will regrow if you don't destroy the bush for sticks.

Want to peak at the innards and see what horrible things I did to get this done in 48 hours? Well here ya go!
unity project files: https://drive.google.com/open?id=1rRAfJd9ijeUQoVWVGBcKtCnFgd18Rfdh
